data.title: AtomicEditor root project is a resource path, and shouldn't be
data.body:
The root project path is a resource path currently, this causes problems where for example

```
MyProject
    Cache
    Resources
```

A resource referenced by "Cache/ae7a867aaa86876a86a86" and "ae7a867aaa86876a86a86" will be seen as 2 difference resources, technically should never reference the asset as the former, but it is easy to accidentally do so

data.title: This should address Windows building 2x on CI box
Create CI task for Linux builds
data.body: The build refactor needs a Linux task that builds Editor/Player linux binaries

data.title: Build Tweaks
Atomic Editor Windows installer uses NSIS which doesn't handle elevating to admin level for a folder which requires it
data.body: If you run without admin, you can't write to C:\Program Files, etc

data.title: Added the Breakout example to the welcome screen.
Build and CI Work
Refactor Build/Scripts and Build/CIScripts to share a common library
data.body: Local dev build scripts and CI scripts have now been split, however there is some duplicated functionality that should be refactored to a common build library

data.title: Unify Cache + Project prefab files
data.body: There's some sorting that could happen, the tricky thing being that when laying out prefabs in scenes you need to load by UUID, when scripting, you want to load via path. If you move prefabs around in your project, you don't want to break scene references. It is possible that prefabs should be indexed by UUID somehow (maybe at deploy/play time)

data.title: Reload the cache file
Added messages for the Windows build output
Fix for assertation error on collisionchain2d
Document process of adding a new script package which interfaces with C++ code
data.body: Including how to hook the js init code (possibly improving this in the process)

data.title: Generate an event when an inspector field value is set
data.body:
1)  Editor context only
2)  Include attr name in event (possibly value?)
3)  Have the component send the event so it can be listened to

data.title: Reimport/update models when they change on disk
data.body:
Artist request:
*fbx's don't seem to update in viewport after changes

data.title: Implement a color picker
data.body:
Artist request:
*Add a color picker for editing colors

data.title: Add shift+drag to duplicate objects
data.body:
Artist request:
*Add the ability to use click+drag in the scene view to duplicate objects and move the clones in one action

data.title: More Undo/Redo support to the editor
data.body:
Artist request:
*Ideally Undo/Redo for all Editor actions
*Most importantly for copy/cut/paste and translate/rotate/scale

data.title: Hierarchy view feature requests

milestone.title: Issue Staging
milestone.description: A staging area for milestones, while we work through the backlog

data.body:
Artist requests:
- [ ] Ability to reorder assets
- [ ] Ability to create folders/groups
- [x] Multiple selection
- [ ] Arrange assets by type or name
- [ ] Copy+Paste shortcuts

data.title: Remember player positioning when run from editor
data.body:
Artist request:
*When playing from the editor, the player opens in the same position, blocking the editor. It should remember the last place it was moved to.

data.title: Allow window and viewport customization in the editor
data.body:
Artist request:
*Remember editor window size and position
*Ability to customize the editor view by moving/adding/removing windows
*Remember configuration

data.title: Add shortcuts, unit locking and global/local transform for transform editing
data.body:
Artist requests:
*Add shortcuts for toggling Translate/Rotate/Scaling modes (usually W/E/R)
*Ability to lock translation to multiples of a set of values or customizable value
*Ability to togle between global and local transform modification

data.title: Implement sliders/spinners for numeric fields
data.body:
Artist request:
Would be nice to have a spinner control to modify numeric values up and down without entering new values.
